procedures.name: Dental Caries
procedures.diagnosis: Visual detection (white spot/cavitation), tactile softness with explorer, radiographic radiolucency. ICDAS criteria used for classification.

management_plan.title: Prevention
management_plan.description: Oral hygiene instruction, fluoride varnish, sealants, diet counseling

management_plan.title: Non-cavitated lesions
management_plan.description: Fluoride varnish, remineralization paste, sealant

management_plan.title: Cavitated lesions
management_plan.description: Atraumatic Restorative Treatment (ART) or resin infiltration (minimal); composite/GIC restoration (moderate); pulp capping/pulpotomy/pulpectomy (deep)

procedures.name: Gingivitis
procedures.diagnosis: Bleeding on probing, redness, swelling, no attachment loss, no bone loss.

management_plan.title: Professional prophylaxis
management_plan.description: Scaling and polishing

management_plan.title: Oral hygiene instruction
management_plan.description: Bass brushing technique, flossing/interdental brushes

management_plan.title: Chemical adjuncts
management_plan.description: Chlorhexidine mouthwash (short-term)

management_plan.title: Re-evaluation
management_plan.description: Follow-up at 4-6 weeks

procedures.name: Pulpitis
procedures.diagnosis: Reversible: Sharp, short pain to cold/hot, no spontaneous pain. Irreversible: Dull, throbbing, lingering pain, spontaneous pain, percussion sensitivity.

management_plan.title: Reversible pulpitis
management_plan.description: Remove caries, sedative lining (GIC), definitive restoration

management_plan.title: Irreversible pulpitis
management_plan.description: Root canal treatment (access, cleaning, shaping, obturation), coronal seal (core + crown), or extraction if unrestorable

procedures.name: Dental Abscess
procedures.diagnosis: Periapical: Pain on percussion/vitality tests, swelling, sinus tract, radiographic periapical radiolucency. Periodontal: Deep PPD, suppuration, vertical bone loss.

management_plan.title: Drainage
management_plan.description: Incision & drainage if fluctuant

management_plan.title: Antibiotics
management_plan.description: Only if systemic signs (amoxicillin 500mg TDS x5-7 days)

management_plan.title: Definitive treatment
management_plan.description: RCT/extraction (periapical); scaling/local antibiotics/surgery (periodontal)

procedures.name: Tooth Extraction
procedures.diagnosis: Non-restorable tooth, severe periodontal disease, orthodontic requirements, impacted teeth.

management_plan.title: Pre-operative assessment
management_plan.description: Medical history, consent, local anesthesia

management_plan.title: Extraction technique
management_plan.description: Simple: Luxation and elevation; Surgical: Flap, bone removal, sectioning

management_plan.title: Post-operative care
management_plan.description: Hemostasis, sutures if needed, post-op instructions

procedures.name: Root Canal Treatment (Endodontic Therapy)
procedures.diagnosis: Irreversible pulpitis, pulp necrosis, or periapical pathology requiring endodontic intervention. Clinical signs include spontaneous pain, prolonged response to thermal stimuli, and radiographic periapical radiolucency.

management_plan.title: Diagnosis and Treatment Planning
management_plan.description: Confirm diagnosis, assess restorability, obtain informed consent, prescribe antibiotics if indicated

management_plan.title: Access Cavity Preparation
management_plan.description: Rubber dam isolation, access cavity preparation, locate canal orifices, initial debridement

management_plan.title: Cleaning and Shaping
management_plan.description: Working length determination, mechanical preparation with rotary/hand files, copious irrigation with NaOCl

management_plan.title: Obturation
management_plan.description: Canal disinfection, master cone fit verification, lateral/vertical condensation, coronal seal

management_plan.title: Restoration
management_plan.description: Immediate coronal restoration, core buildup if needed, crown preparation and placement

references: ESE Quality Guidelines for Endodontic Treatment

procedures.name: Non-Surgical Periodontal Therapy
procedures.diagnosis: Chronic periodontitis with probing depths >4mm, bleeding on probing, clinical attachment loss, and radiographic bone loss.

management_plan.title: Initial Therapy
management_plan.description: Oral hygiene instruction, supragingival scaling, motivation and education

management_plan.title: Scaling and Root Planing
management_plan.description: Subgingival debridement, root surface debridement, local anesthesia as needed

management_plan.title: Adjunctive Therapy
management_plan.description: Local antimicrobials (minocycline, doxycycline), systemic antibiotics if indicated

management_plan.title: Re-evaluation
management_plan.description: 4-6 week re-evaluation, assess healing, determine need for surgical therapy

management_plan.title: Maintenance
management_plan.description: 3-4 month recall intervals, supportive periodontal therapy, ongoing monitoring

procedures.name: Dental Implant Placement
procedures.diagnosis: Missing tooth/teeth requiring replacement with adequate bone volume, healthy periodontium, and good oral hygiene.

management_plan.title: Pre-surgical Planning
management_plan.description: 3D treatment planning, surgical guide fabrication, implant selection, patient preparation

management_plan.title: Surgical Phase
management_plan.description: Local anesthesia, flap elevation, osteotomy preparation, implant placement, primary closure

management_plan.title: Healing Phase
management_plan.description: 3-6 months osseointegration, soft tissue management, temporary restoration if indicated

management_plan.title: Restorative Phase
management_plan.description: Second stage surgery (if needed), impression taking, crown fabrication and delivery

management_plan.title: Maintenance
management_plan.description: Regular recall appointments, peri-implant tissue monitoring, professional maintenance

references: ITI Treatment Guide for Dental Implants

procedures.name: Third Molar (Wisdom Tooth) Extraction
procedures.diagnosis: Impacted or problematic third molars causing pain, infection, caries, or periodontal problems.

management_plan.title: Pre-operative Assessment
management_plan.description: Risk assessment, informed consent, medical clearance if needed, antibiotic prophylaxis if indicated

management_plan.title: Surgical Extraction
management_plan.description: Local anesthesia, flap design, bone removal, tooth sectioning, extraction, socket debridement

management_plan.title: Wound Closure
management_plan.description: Primary closure with sutures, hemostasis, post-operative instructions

management_plan.title: Post-operative Care
management_plan.description: Pain management, antibiotics if indicated, follow-up appointment, suture removal

references: AAOMS Guidelines for Third Molar Surgery
NICE Guidelines for Wisdom Tooth Removal

procedures.name: Comprehensive Orthodontic Treatment
procedures.diagnosis: Malocclusion requiring comprehensive orthodontic correction including crowding, spacing, overbite, underbite, or crossbite.

management_plan.title: Treatment Planning
management_plan.description: Problem list, treatment objectives, appliance selection, treatment sequence planning

management_plan.title: Initial Alignment
management_plan.description: Bracket placement, initial archwires, leveling and alignment phase

management_plan.title: Space Closure
management_plan.description: Extraction space closure (if applicable), canine retraction, incisor retraction

management_plan.title: Finishing and Detailing
management_plan.description: Final positioning, occlusal settling, root parallelism, bracket removal

management_plan.title: Retention
management_plan.description: Retainer delivery, retention protocol, long-term follow-up

procedures.name: Crown and Bridge Treatment
procedures.diagnosis: Extensively damaged teeth requiring full coverage restoration or missing teeth requiring fixed partial denture replacement.

management_plan.title: Treatment Planning
management_plan.description: Comprehensive examination, treatment sequencing, material selection, cost estimation

management_plan.title: Tooth Preparation
management_plan.description: Crown preparation, impression taking, temporary crown fabrication, shade selection

management_plan.title: Laboratory Phase
management_plan.description: Crown fabrication, try-in appointment, adjustments, final glazing

management_plan.title: Cementation
management_plan.description: Final try-in, occlusal adjustment, cementation, post-operative instructions

management_plan.title: Follow-up
management_plan.description: Post-cementation check, long-term maintenance, recall appointments

procedures.name: Pediatric Dental Treatment
procedures.diagnosis: Dental treatment for children including behavior management, preventive care, and restorative treatment.

management_plan.title: Behavior Management
management_plan.description: Tell-show-do technique, positive reinforcement, distraction techniques

management_plan.title: Preventive Care
management_plan.description: Fluoride application, sealants, oral hygiene instruction, dietary counseling

management_plan.title: Restorative Treatment
management_plan.description: Primary tooth restorations, pulp therapy, space maintenance

management_plan.title: Follow-up
management_plan.description: Regular recall appointments, growth and development monitoring

references: IAPD Guidelines for Pediatric Oral Health
